bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of a poisoning or injury brought forth by inadvertently or consciously swallowing something that is poisonous or otherwise harmful. Zhou hou bei ji fang 肘後備急方 6: 誤吞釘及 箭、金針、錢鐵等物方。多食肥羊脂，諸般肥肉等。自裹之，必得出 , “Recipe for having mistakenly swallowed a nail, an arrow, a metal needle, a coin or a piece of iron: Eat much lamb fat, and all kinds of fat meat. This will bind it and it will come out”.
